title: disconected to Maestro error crashing
body: hi ive been haveing the league maestro error after 6.14 pach my game will just crash after a  few min. tried restarting and reinsalling still not working.

replies.body: It sounds like you may be experiencing an unstable connection with your network reaching our game server.  I recommend going over our [Connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to troubleshoot this.  If your issue persists, please contact player support as Rineey suggested by submitting a ticket.

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 

* For the secondary category, select **I’m having issues on the PvP.Net Client**

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg



[Need help obtaining logs? Soraka will be your aide! ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

https://static2.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/57010692ced3c.jpg
